医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
公交车司机因严重 COVID-19 住院的可能性增加了一倍在大流行后期，公交车司机因严重 COVID-19 住院的风险增加了一倍，教育和医疗保健领域的一些职业也面临严重疾病的风险。哥德堡大学的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Bus-drivers-twice-as-likely-to-be-hospitalized-for-severe-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Bus-drivers-twice-as-likely-to-be-hospitalized-for-severe-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4edeac1-c880-4a02-a606-87673df0380e Wed, 23 Aug 2023 13:55:49 -0400 Bus drivers twice as likely to be hospitalized for severe COVID-19
研究发现，免疫系统受损的人不太可能产生 COVID-19 抗体新研究确定了哪些免疫系统受损的人不太可能拥有 COVID-19 抗体，从而使他们更容易受到严重感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/People-with-compromished-immune-systems-less-likely-to-have-COVID-19-antibodies-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/People-with-compromished-immune-systems-less-likely-to-have-COVID-19-antibodies-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d3673ec-7e7d-4f5d-90c4-af6a67a1646e Wed, 23 Aug 2023 13:32:45 -0400 People with compromised immune systems less likely to have COVID-19 antibodies, study finds
